title: SSC GD Constable 2026
description: Recruitment for Constable (General Duty) in Central Armed Police Forces (CAPFs), NIA, SSF and Rifleman (GD) in Assam Rifles.

title: GATE 2026
description: Graduate Aptitude Test in Engineering (GATE) is a national level exam that primarily tests the comprehensive understanding of various undergraduate subjects in Engineering and Technology.

title: Combined Defence Services (I) 2026
description: Exam for recruitment into the Indian Military Academy, Officers Training Academy, Indian Naval Academy and Indian Air Force Academy.

title: NDA & NA (I) Examination 2026
description: National Defence Academy and Naval Academy Examination (I) 2026 for admission to the Army, Navy and Air Force wings of the NDA.

title: Civil Services (Pre) Examination 2026
description: The Civil Services Examination (Preliminary) 2026 for recruitment to IAS, IPS, IFS and other central services.

title: SSC CHSL 2026
description: Combined Higher Secondary (10+2) Level Examination for recruitment to Lower Divisional Clerk / Junior Secretariat Assistant, and Data Entry Operators.

title: RBI Grade B Officer 2026
description: Recruitment of Officers in Grade 'B' (General) - DR, DEPR and DSIM in Common Seniority Group.

title: IBPS RRB Officer / Assistant 2026
description: Common Recruitment Process for Recruitment of Officers (Scale-I, II & III) and Office Assistants (Multipurpose) in Regional Rural Banks (RRBs).

title: SSC CGL 2026
description: Combined Graduate Level Examination 2026 for recruitment to Group B and Group C posts in various Ministries/Departments.

title: NEET UG 2026
description: National Eligibility cum Entrance Test (Undergraduate) for admission to MBBS/BDS courses in Indian medical colleges.

eligibility.ageLimit: Minimum 17 years as of Dec 31 of the year of admission.
eligibility.qualification: 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry, Biology/Biotechnology, and English.

examPattern: Offline (Pen & Paper). 200 Questions (180 to be attempted). 720 Marks. Duration: 3 Hours 20 Minutes.
importantInstructions: Candidates must ensure they fulfill the age criteria.
Aadhar Card is mandatory for verification.
Carry a postcard size photograph to the center.

title: JEE Main 2026 (Session 1)
description: Joint Entrance Examination (Main) for admission to NITs, IIITs, and other Centrally Funded Technical Institutions.

eligibility.qualification: Passed 10+2 examination with Physics and Mathematics as compulsory subjects.

examPattern: Computer Based Test. Paper 1 (B.E./B.Tech) - Physics, Chemistry, Maths. 90 Questions. 300 Marks.
importantInstructions: Candidates can appear in 3 consecutive years.
Session 2 is optional but recommended for score improvement.

title: JEE Advanced 2026
description: Joint Entrance Examination (Advanced) for admission to the Indian Institutes of Technology (IITs).

eligibility.ageLimit: Candidates should have been born on or after October 1, 2001 (5 years relaxation for SC/ST/PwD).
eligibility.qualification: Must qualify JEE Main 2026 and be among top 2,50,000 candidates.

examPattern: Two compulsory papers (Paper 1 & Paper 2). Physics, Chemistry, Maths. Mixed question types.
importantInstructions: Both Paper 1 and Paper 2 are compulsory.
Attempt limit: Maximum of two times in two consecutive years.
Download Admit Card before the deadline.

title: CAT 2026
description: Common Admission Test for admission to MBA/PGDM programs in IIMs and other top business schools.

eligibility.qualification: Bachelor's Degree with at least 50% marks (45% for SC/ST/PwD).

examPattern: Computer Based Test. 3 Sections: VARC, DILR, QA. Duration: 2 Hours (40 min/section).
importantInstructions: Calculators are not allowed (On-screen calculator provided).
Reach the center 90 minutes before start.

title: CLAT 2026
description: Common Law Admission Test for admission to undergraduate and postgraduate law programmes offered by 22 National Law Universities.

eligibility.ageLimit: No upper age limit for UG Programme.

examPattern: Offline. 120 Questions. 120 Marks. Duration: 2 Hours. English, Current Affairs, Logic, Math, Legal Reasoning.
importantInstructions: Negative marking of 0.25 marks for wrong answers.
Carry valid ID proof and Black/Blue ball pen.

title: UGC NET Dec 2025
description: University Grants Commission National Eligibility Test for Assistant Professor and Junior Research Fellowship.

eligibility.ageLimit: JRF: Not more than 30 years. Assistant Professor: No age limit.
eligibility.qualification: Master's Degree with 55% marks (50% for SC/ST/OBC/PwD).

examPattern: CBT. Paper 1 (General) + Paper 2 (Subject). Total 150 Questions. No break between papers.
importantInstructions: Ensure subject code is correct during application.

title: CTET Jan 2026
description: Central Teacher Eligibility Test for appointment as a teacher in classes I to VIII.

eligibility.qualification: Paper I: Senior Secondary + DElEd. Paper II: Graduation + B.Ed.

examPattern: Offline. 150 MCQs. 150 Marks. Duration: 2.5 Hours per paper.

title: RRB NTPC 2026
description: Non-Technical Popular Categories recruitment for various posts in Indian Railways.
